FuncDef: The display ipv6 routing-table statistics command displays integrated route statistics of the IPv6 routing table.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays integrated route statistics of all IPv6 routes.
-

Examples: Protocol   route       active      added       deleted     freed
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Integrated route statistics include:
Total number of routes that are added or deleted through the routing protocolNumber of active routes or inactive routes that are labeled for deletion but have not been deleted
